大推：愛爾蘭咖啡、咖啡馬丁尼、Mojito
警告：酒感五顆星的不是隨便寫寫，酒量不好的不要亂嘗試
EN:
In the classic bartending, it really played very well!
Whether it is surrounded by coffee beans, the berry is sweet or citrus embellishment, and each cup surprises me.
After the entrance, the depth of the front, middle and back flavor is clear, endless, and classic.
Big push: Irish coffee, coffee Martini, Mojito
Warning: The five stars are not written casually.

Original: 我對這個地方感到很震驚。令人難以置信的主題、美妙的氛圍和音樂、對昭和時代小玩意的細節的關注。我喜歡它。樓主好冷淡啊此外，他們還提供精釀啤酒和雞尾酒。日立無巢和京都！與我在台灣見過的其他地方不同，必須參觀。

Original:
一個漂亮的酒吧，有一些非常時髦的裝飾（娃娃、日本畫等）。那裡的氣氛其實相當活躍有趣。

這些飲料很好，價格與該地區其他地方相似。

服務也相當不錯。

最後，沒有最低收費，這一點受到了歡迎。
EN:
A beautiful bar, there are some very fashionable decorations (dolls, Japanese paintings, etc.).The atmosphere there is actually quite active and interesting.

These drinks are very good, and the price is similar to other parts of the area.

The service is also pretty good.

In the end, there was no minimum fee, which was welcomed.

Original: 我去過的最好的酒吧之一——也許是最好的。這是龐克和其他另類人士的聚會場所，但非常適合所有喜歡好音樂、飲料和有趣的人的人。精心調製的優質雞尾酒和優惠的價格。這裡的工作人員不僅僅是友好。週末可能會很擁擠，但這只會讓事情變得更有趣。立即預訂航班並前往那裡。
EN: One of the best bars I have -maybe the best.This is a place for Punk and other alternative people, but it is very suitable for everyone who likes good music, drinks and interesting.Carefully prepared high -quality cocktails and discount prices.The staff here is not just friendly.Weekends may be crowded, but this will only make things more interesting.Book the flight immediately and go there.
